text.content: No Reason for Visit was given.

content.content: Community acquired pneumonia with mild hypoxemia
2.5mg/3ml NEB 3 times daily PRN wheezing/shortness of breath

item.content: Asthma Management resources and instructions provided during admission

content.content: Acute onset shortness of breath with fevers, chills, and cough productive of greenish sputum for the past 2 days
